entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 10.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
